adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves after the target.

angerpoint.name: Anger Point
angerpoint.description: Maxes the Attack stat after the Pokémon takes a critical hit.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: Senses an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

aromaveil.name: Aroma Veil
aromaveil.description: Protects allies from attacks that effect their mental state

asone.name: As One
asone.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and its rides Neigh.

aurabreak.name: Aura Break
aurabreak.description: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed.

baddreams.name: Bad Dreams
baddreams.description: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

ballfetch.name: Ball Fetch
ballfetch.description: If not holding an item, it'll fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

battlearmour.name: Battle Armor
battlearmour.description: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

battlebond.name: Battle Bond
battlebond.description: Defeat a Pokémon to unleash Ash Greninja!

beastboost.name: Beast Boost
beastboost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

bigpecks.name: Big Pecks
bigpecks.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

cheekpouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheekpouch.description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

chillingneigh.name: Chilling Neigh
chillingneigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in sunshine.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.description: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

cottondown.name: Cotton Down
cottondown.description: When hit by an attack, it lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

curiousmedicine.name: Curious Medicine
curiousmedicine.description: Removes all stat changes from allies on entry to battle.

cursedbody.name: Cursed Body
cursedbody.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.description: Copies Dance moves that are used.

darkaura.name: Dark Aura
darkaura.description: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

dauntlessshield.name: Dauntless Shield
dauntlessshield.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when its stats are lowered.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

download.name: Download
download.description: Adjusts power based on an opposing Pokémon's stats.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dryskin.name: Dry Skin
dryskin.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

electricsurge.name: Electric Surge
electricsurge.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

emergencyexit.name: Emergency Exit
emergencyexit.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

fairyaura.name: Fairy Aura
fairyaura.description: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

flareboost.name: Flare Boost
flareboost.description: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.description: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it is hit by one.

flowergift.name: Flower Gift
flowergift.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flowerveil.name: Flower Veil
flowerveil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: Determines what moves an opposing Pokémon has.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.description: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

fullmetalbody.name: Full Metal Body
fullmetalbody.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

galewings.name: Gale Wings
galewings.description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves, but only if the user has full health.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Makes the Pokémon use a held Berry earlier than usual.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attackers Speed stat.

gorillatactics.name: Gorilla Tactics
gorillatactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

grasspelt.name: Grass Pelt
grasspelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

grassysurge.name: Grassy Surge
grassysurge.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grimneigh.name: Grim Neigh
grimneigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Special Attack stat.

gulpmissile.name: Gulp Missile
gulpmissile.description: When using Surf or Dive, it catches prey it uses to attack when hit.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Boosts the Attack stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honeygather.name: Honey Gather
honeygather.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hungerswitch.name: Hunger Switch
hungerswitch.description: The Pokémon changes between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: Heals status conditions if it is raining.

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

icebody.name: Ice Body
icebody.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

iceface.name: Ice Face
iceface.description: It's ice head takes a physical attack as substitute, changing it's appearance, and restored when hails.

icescales.name: Ice Scales
icescales.description: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier and strikes.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat.

intrepidsword.name: Intrepid Sword
intrepidsword.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

ironbarbs.name: Iron Barbs
ironbarbs.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Boosts the Attack stat when it's hit by a Dark-type move.

keeneye.name: Keen Eye
keeneye.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

leafguard.name: Leaf Guard
leafguard.description: Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

libero.name: Libero
libero.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.

liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

liquidvoice.name: Liquid Voice
liquidvoice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

longreach.name: Long Reach
longreach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magicguard.name: Magic Guard
magicguard.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.description: Boosts the Defense stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

megalauncher.name: Mega Launcher
megalauncher.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

mimicry.name: Mimicry
mimicry.description: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

mirrorarmor.name: Mirror Armor
mirrorarmor.description: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

mistysurge.name: Misty Surge
mistysurge.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

motordrive.name: Motor Drive
motordrive.description: Boosts the Speed stat when it's hit by an Electric-type move.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: Boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the Plate it holds.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.description: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

noguard.name: No Guard
noguard.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type.

neuroforce.name: Neuroforce
neuroforce.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.

neutralizinggas.name: Neutralizing Gas
neutralizinggas.description: When in battle, disables the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail and powder.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

owntempo.name: Own Tempo
owntempo.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pastelveil.name: Pastel Veil
pastelveil.description: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

perishbody.name: Perish Body
perishbody.description: Hit by a contact move, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless switched.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

poisonheal.name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

poisontouch.name: Poison Touch
poisontouch.description: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

powerconstruct.name: Power Construct
powerconstruct.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.

powerofalchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
powerofalchemy.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

powerspot.name: Power Spot
powerspot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Gives priority to a status move, but fails against Dark-type Pokémon.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: The Pokémon raises opposing Pokémon's PP usage.

prismarmor.name: Prism Armor
prismarmor.description: Reduces the power of super-effective attacks taken.

propellertail.name: Propeller Tail
propellertail.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's using.

psychicsurge.name: Psychic Surge
psychicsurge.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

punkrock.name: Punk Rock
punkrock.description: Boosts the power of sound-based moves, taking half their damage.

quickdraw.name: Quick Draw
quickdraw.description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

quickfeet.name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: Some move types scare it and boost it Speed stat.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

ripen.name: Ripen
ripen.description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender.

rkssystem.name: RKS System
rkssystem.description: Changes type depending on held item.

rockhead.name: Rock Head
rockhead.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

runaway.name: Run Away
runaway.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

sandforce.name: Sand Force
sandforce.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

sandrush.name: Sand Rush
sandrush.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

sandspit.name: Sand Spit
sandspit.description: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

sapsipper.name: Sap Sipper
sapsipper.description: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

screencleaner.name: Screen Cleaner
screencleaner.description: Nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil for all in battle.

serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring.

shadowshield.name: Shadow Shield
shadowshield.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions.

sheerforce.name: Sheer Force
sheerforce.description: Removes additional effects to increase move damage.

shellarmour.name: Shell Armor
shellarmour.description: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.description: Blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

shieldsdown.name: Shields Down
shieldsdown.description: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

skilllink.name: Skill Link
skilllink.description: Increases the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

slowstart.name: Slow Start
slowstart.description: Temporarily halves the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats.

slushrush.name: Slush Rush
slushrush.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

snowwarning.name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases.

soulheart.name: Soul-Heart
soulheart.description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.description: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

stancechange.name: Stance Change
stancechange.description: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

static.name: Static
static.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

steamengine.name: Steam Engine
steamengine.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

steelyspirit.name: Steely Spirit
steelyspirit.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

stench.name: Stench
stench.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

stormdrain.name: Storm Drain
stormdrain.description: Draws in all Water-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.

strongjaw.name: Strong Jaw
strongjaw.description: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.description: Negates all moves and items that force switching out.

superluck.name: Super Luck
superluck.description: Boosts the critical-hit ratios of moves.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil
sweetveil.description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: Passes poison, paralyze, or burn to the Pokémon that inflicted it.

tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

tanglinghair.name: Tangling Hair
tanglinghair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.description: Boosts resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

toughclaws.name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

toxicboost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicboost.description: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: The Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores the opposing Pokémon's stat changes.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Boosts the Speed stat if its held item is used or lost.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

unseenfist.name: Unseen Fist
unseenfist.description: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

victorystar.name: Victory Star
victorystar.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

wanderingspirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wanderingspirit.description: Exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

waterbubble.name: Water Bubble
waterbubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves and prevents burns.

watercompaction.name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.description: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

weakarmor.name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.description: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

wimpout.name: Wimp Out
wimpout.description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.description: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

zenmode.name: Zen Mode
zenmode.description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less.

deltastream.name: Delta Stream
deltastream.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.

desolateland.name: Desolate Land
desolateland.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

primordialsea.name: Primordial Sea
primordialsea.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.
